content.question: Because of conflict and political instability in Country Y, millions of its citizens emigrate to Country X. Which of the following best explains what will happen to Country X?

choices.label: Country X’s <math alttext="P P C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will not change, but its consumption of goods will decrease.
Country X’s production will move to a point inside its <math alttext="P P C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, indicating slower growth.
Country X’s production will move to a point on its <math alttext="P P C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> at which it produces only consumer goods.
Country X’s <math alttext="P P C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will shift outward over time.
Country X’s <math alttext="P P C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will shift inward over time.

content.answer: Country X’s <math alttext="P P C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will shift outward over time.
